mojo.description: Apache Commons Build Mojo: Generate all pages.

parameter.name: project.name
parameter.description: The name of the project currently being built.

parameter.name: project.description
parameter.description: A description of the project currently being built.

parameter.name: project.groupId
parameter.description: The groupId of the project currently being built.

parameter.name: project.artifactId
parameter.description: The artifactId of the project currently being built.

parameter.name: project.inceptionYear
parameter.description: The inception year of the project currently being built.

parameter.name: commons.jira.id
parameter.description: The external JIRA id for the project (alphabetic, upper case.)

parameter.name: commons.componentid
parameter.description: The commons component id.

parameter.name: commons.jira.pid
parameter.description: The internal JIRA id for the project (numeric.)

parameter.name: commons.release.version
parameter.description: The version of the latest release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.name
parameter.description: The name of the latest release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.binary.suffix
parameter.description: The suffix for the binary distribution.

parameter.name: commons.release.desc
parameter.description: Release Title or Description.

parameter.name: commons.release.subdir
parameter.description: Subdirectory (instead of source/binaries.)

parameter.name: commons.release.2.version
parameter.description: The version of an alternative release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.2.name
parameter.description: The name of the alternative release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.2.desc
parameter.description: Alternative Release Title or Description.

parameter.name: commons.release.2.binary.suffix
parameter.description: The suffix for the alternative release binary distribution.

parameter.name: commons.release.2.subdir
parameter.description: Subdirectory (instead of source/binaries.)

parameter.name: commons.release.3.version
parameter.description: The version of an alternative release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.3.name
parameter.description: The name of the alternative release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.3.desc
parameter.description: Alternative Release Title or Description.

parameter.name: commons.release.3.binary.suffix
parameter.description: The suffix for the alternative release binary distribution.

parameter.name: commons.release.3.subdir
parameter.description: Subdirectory (instead of source/binaries.)

parameter.name: commons.release.4.version
parameter.description: The version of an alternative release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.4.name
parameter.description: The name of the alternative release of the project.

parameter.name: commons.release.4.desc
parameter.description: Alternative Release Title or Description.

parameter.name: commons.release.4.binary.suffix
parameter.description: The suffix for the alternative release binary distribution.

parameter.name: commons.release.4.subdir
parameter.description: Subdirectory (instead of source/binaries.)
